modules.name: Orchestrator
modules.notes: Task state machine, event logging, replay capability fully implemented

modules.name: Desktop Control
modules.notes: Cursor IDE and Terminal control via AppleScript on macOS

modules.name: LLM Router
modules.notes: Claude and OpenRouter integration with routing strategies and fallback

modules.name: TUI Dashboard
modules.notes: ratatui-based dashboard with hotkeys and task display

modules.name: PLAN & REVIEW Workflow
modules.notes: Complete workflow integration with plan generation, edit automation, and AI-powered review

technical_achievements: Full async/await Rust architecture with tokio
Provider-agnostic LLM routing with Claude and OpenRouter support
Task state machine with retry logic and exponential backoff
Cost and latency tracking for LLM operations
Comprehensive error handling and fallback mechanisms
Production-ready code with zero TODO placeholders
architecture_highlights: Modular design with clear separation of concerns
Comprehensive test coverage across all modules
next_sprint_recommendations: Implement APPLY workflow for automated patch application
Expand desktop control to Linux and Windows
Add metrics collection and analysis features

risks.mitigation: Secure key storage and rotation planned for Sprint-02
